EventWhoRelation.name: EventWhoRelation
EventWhoRelation.description: Represents the relationship between an event and a lead or contacts. This derived object is a filtered version of the EventRelation object; that is, IsParent is true and IsWhat is false. It doesnâ€™t represent relationships to invitees or to accounts, opportunities, or other objects.

EventId.description: Indicates the ID of the event.

RelationId.description: Indicates the ID of the contacts or lead related to the event.

Type.description: Indicates whether the person related to the event is a contact or lead.
